entity.name: Praetorian Guard
entity.entry:
The Praetor is the top authority in the land and wields authority along with the [organisation:6801105]. The Guard is charged with enforcing rules within the city and other duties as assigned, but generally, there is friction between the Senate and the Praetor

Players may earn [ability:6801106] and honorary titles through service to the Praetorian Guard:

  • Red Cloak - sometimes called "Tiro" or recruit.
  • Red Blade - Often referred to at Mile (pronounced Me-Lay)
  • Legionnaire - or Mile Principales, this is the kind of guard who's good at battle.
  • Optio - Assists the Centurion with leadership roles
  • Centurion - Command a century or 80 or so troops.

These titles will be recognized by the leadership of the Guard, including Praetor [character:6801107]. There are other titles but they are used in the legions. I'll lost them here in ascending order of importance:

  • Legionnaire - Line soldier
  • Optio - Assistant to the centurion
  • Centurion - leads 80 legionnaires
  • Primus - Senior most Centurion... still a centurion.
  • Prefect - Camp logistics, handles food and fortifications.
  • Tribunus - Second in command, executive officer.
  • Legatus - Legion commander

The legion is very strict with their titles, but may jokingly call the party chatterbox, "Primus" to get a chuckle out of the troops.
